description:
Aug 16-17: West LRT - 69 Street to Downtown West/Kerby closure

The Blue Line will be closed between Westbrook and Downtown West/Kerby stations starting Saturday, August 16 until the very early hours of Monday, August 18.

Trains coming from the east/downtown will terminate at Downtown West/Kerby Station, and trains from the west will terminate at Westbrook. For travel between Downtown West/Kerby and Westbrook Station, we¿ll have shuttle buses replacing train service.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
